TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XNamespace extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Represents an XML namespace.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示命名空间的 XML 构造。This class represents the XML construct of namespaces. 每个包含。Every contains an . 即使某个元素不在命名空间中，该元素的 仍包含命名空间 。Even if an element is not in a namespace, the element's still contains a namespace, . 属性一定不会是 `null`。The property is guaranteed to not be `null`. ## 创建 XNamespace 对象Creating an XNamespace Object 若要创建的最常见方法对象是只需将字符串分配给它。The most common way to create an object is to simply assign a string to it. 通过使用加法运算符的替代，然后可以使用本地名称组合命名空间。You can then combine the namespace with a local name by using the override of the addition operator. 下面的示例演示此习惯用法：The following example shows this idiom: ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", "Content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim aw As XNamespace = "http://www.adventure-works.com" Dim root As XElement = New XElement(aw + "Root", "Content") Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 但是，在 Visual Basic 中，你将通常会声明全局默认命名空间，如下所示：However, in Visual Basic, you would typically declare a global default namespace, as follows: ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = _ Content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Content ``` 分配的字符串使用隐式转换从。Assigning a string to an uses the implicit conversion from . 请参阅[如何： 使用命名空间 (C#) (LINQ to XML) 创建文档](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af4a595e-ffb2-4187-a61b-d5ed71642c4c)有关详细信息和示例。See [How to: Create a Document with Namespaces (C#) (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af4a595e-ffb2-4187-a61b-d5ed71642c4c) for more information and examples. 请参阅[在 Visual Basic (LINQ to XML) 中的命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10b7ba7b-518c-4f14-899f-892575d14dcc)有关使用 Visual Basic 中的命名空间的详细信息。See [Namespaces in Visual Basic (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10b7ba7b-518c-4f14-899f-892575d14dcc) for more information on using namespaces in Visual Basic. ## 控制 Namespace 前缀Controlling Namespace Prefixes 如果你创建声明一个命名空间的属性，属性中指定的前缀将保留在序列化的 XML。If you create an attribute that declares a namespace, the prefix specified in the attribute will be persisted in the serialized XML. 若要创建一个声明具有前缀的命名空间的属性，请创建一个属性，该属性的名称的命名空间为 ，该属性的名称为命名空间前缀。To create an attribute that declares a namespace with a prefix, you create an attribute where the namespace of the name of the attribute is , and the name of the attribute is the namespace prefix. 该属性的值即是命名空间的 URI。The value of the attribute is the URI of the namespace. 下面的示例演示此习惯用法：The following example shows this idiom: ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), "Content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim aw As XNamespace = "http://www.adventure-works.com" Dim root As XElement = New XElement(aw + "Root", _ New XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), _ "Content") Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 在 Visual Basic 中，而不是创建要控制命名空间前缀的命名空间节点而通常使用全局命名空间声明：In Visual Basic, instead of creating a namespace node to control namespace prefixes, you would typically use a global namespace declaration: ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = _ Content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Content ``` 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 控制 Namespace 前缀 (C#) (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a40d4479-f1b9-4d8b-8623-445648caed28)。For more information, see [How to: Control Namespace Prefixes (C#) (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a40d4479-f1b9-4d8b-8623-445648caed28). ## 创建默认 NamespaceCreating a Default Namespace 构造时属性，它将是命名空间中，如果属性名称包含"xmlns"的特殊值，则当序列化 XML 树时，将命名空间声明为默认命名空间。When constructing an attribute that will be a namespace, if the attribute name has the special value of "xmlns", then when the XML tree is serialized, the namespace will be declared as the default namespace. 具有"xmlns"本身的名称的特殊属性不是任何命名空间中。The special attribute with the name of "xmlns" itself is not in any namespace. 属性的值是命名空间 URI。The value of the attribute is the namespace URI. 下面的示例创建包含命名空间的默认命名空间的方式声明的特性的 XML 树：The following example creates an XML tree that contains an attribute that is declared in such a way that the namespace will become the default namespace: ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute("xmlns", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Child", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim aw As XNamespace = "http://www.adventure-works.com" Dim root As XElement = New XElement(aw + "Root", _ New XAttribute("xmlns", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), _ New XElement(aw + "Child", "content") _ ) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 在 Visual Basic 中，而不是创建命名空间节点创建默认命名空间，而通常使用全局默认命名空间声明：In Visual Basic, instead of creating a namespace node to create a default namespace, you would typically use a global default namespace declaration: ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = _ content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` content ``` ## XNamespace 原子化XNamespace Atomization 对象一定不会是原子化的；即，如果两个 对象具有完全相同的 URI，则它们将共享同一实例。 objects are guaranteed to be atomized; that is, if two objects have exactly the same URI, they will share the same instance. 为此目的，显式提供了相等和比较运算符。The equality and comparison operators are provided explicitly for this purpose. ## 使用扩展的名称Using Expanded Names 另一种方法指定一个命名空间和本地名称是在窗体中使用扩展名`{namespace}name`:Another way to specify a namespace and a local name is to use an expanded name in the form `{namespace}name`: ```csharp XElement e = new XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root", new XAttribute("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Att", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(e); ``` ```vb Dim e As XElement = New XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root", _ New XAttribute("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Att", "content") _ ) Console.WriteLine(e) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` ``` 这种方法的性能较低。This approach has performance implications. 每次将包含扩展名的字符串传递给 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 时，都必须分析名称，查找原子化命名空间，再查找原子化名称。Each time that you pass a string that contains an expanded name to [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)], it must parse the name, find the atomized namespace, and find the atomized name. 这个过程会占用 CPU 时间。This process takes CPU time. 如果性能很重要，你可能想要使用不同的方法。If performance is important, you may want to use a different approach. 对于 Visual Basic 中，建议的方法是使用 XML 文本不涉及使用扩展的名称。With Visual Basic, the recommended approach is to use XML literals, which does not involve the use of expanded names.

param.name: obj
param.span: 要与当前 进行比较的 。

span.span: The to compare to the current .

summary.span: 确定指定的 是否等同于当前的 。

span.span: Determines whether the specified is equal to the current .

returns.span: 指示指定 是否等于当前 的 。

span.span: A that indicates whether the specified is equal to the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于两个的对象相等，它们必须具有相同的 URI。For two objects to be equal, they must have the same URI. ## Examples 下面的示例比较两个引用同一 URI 的命名空间。The following example compares two namespaces that refer to the same URI. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; Console.WriteLine(aw == "http://www.adventure-works.com"); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Console.WriteLine(GetXmlNamespace(aw) = "http://www.adventure-works.com") End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` True ```

param.span: 包含命名空间 URI 的 。

summary.span: 获取指定统一资源标识符 (URI) 的 。

span.span: Gets an for the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

returns.span: 从指定的 URI 创建的 。

span.span: An created from the specified URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回保证对象以保证不可分割 （即，它位于该特定 URI 的系统中只有一个）。The returned object is guaranteed to be atomic (that is, it is the only one in the system for that particular URI). ## Examples 下面的示例获取从指定的 URI。The following example gets a from a specified URI. ```csharp XNamespace aw = XNamespace.Get("http://www.adventure-works.com"); // This is the preferred form. XNamespace aw2 = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; Console.WriteLine(aw); Console.WriteLine(aw2); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = XNamespace.Get("http://www.adventure-works.com") ' This is the preferred form. Dim aw2 As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace(aw) Console.WriteLine(aw) Console.WriteLine(aw2) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` http://www.adventure-works.com http://www.adventure-works.com ```

span.span: An created from this and the specified local name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回保证对象以保证不可分割 （即，它位于特定扩展名的系统中只有一个）。The returned object is guaranteed to be atomic (that is, it is the only one in the system for a specific expanded name). ## Examples 下面的示例使用此属性来检索。The following example uses this property to retrieve an . ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XName name = aw.GetName("Root"); Console.WriteLine("{0}", name); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace(aw) Dim name As XName = aw.GetName("Root") Console.WriteLine("{0}", name) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.adventure-works.com}Root ```

summary.span: 获取此命名空间的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

span.span: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of this namespace.

value.span: 一个包含命名空间 URI 的 。

span.span: A that contains the URI of the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性：The following example shows how to use this property: ```csharp string markup = @""; XElement root = XElement.Parse(markup); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace.NamespaceName); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace(aw) Dim root As XElement = Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace.NamespaceName) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` http://www.adventure-works.com ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace None { get; }
.property class System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace None
Public Shared ReadOnly Property None As XNamespace
public: static property System::Xml::Linq::XNamespace ^ None { System::Xml::Linq::XNamespace ^ get(); };
member this.None : System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace

summary.span: 获取不与命名空间对应的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that corresponds to no namespace.
The that corresponds to no namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在任何命名空间元素或属性，其命名空间将设置为此属性返回的命名空间。If an element or attribute is in no namespace, its namespace will be set to the namespace returned by this property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的使用此属性来确定哪些元素在任何命名空间。The following example shows uses this property to determine which elements are in no namespace. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement(aw + "ChildInNamespace", "content"), new XElement("ChildInNoNamespace", "content") ); if (root.Name.Namespace == XNamespace.None) Console.WriteLine("Root element is in no namespace"); else Console.WriteLine("Root element is in a namespace"); if (root.Element(aw + "ChildInNamespace").Name.Namespace == XNamespace.None) Console.WriteLine("ChildInNamespace element is in no namespace"); else Console.WriteLine("ChildInNamespace element is in a namespace"); if (root.Element("ChildInNoNamespace").Name.Namespace == XNamespace.None) Console.WriteLine("ChildInNoNamespace element is in no namespace"); else Console.WriteLine("ChildInNoNamespace element is in a namespace"); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = _ content content If (root.Name.Namespace Is XNamespace.None) Then Console.WriteLine("Root element is in no namespace") Else Console.WriteLine("Root element is in a namespace") End If If (root.Element(GetXmlNamespace(aw) + "ChildInNamespace") _ .Name.Namespace Is XNamespace.None) Then Console.WriteLine("ChildInNamespace element is in no namespace") Else Console.WriteLine("ChildInNamespace element is in a namespace") End If If (root.Element("ChildInNoNamespace") _ .Name.Namespace Is XNamespace.None) Then Console.WriteLine("ChildInNoNamespace element is in no namespace") Else Console.WriteLine("ChildInNoNamespace element is in a namespace") End If End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Root element is in no namespace ChildInNamespace element is in a namespace ChildInNoNamespace element is in no namespace ```

span.span: Combines an object with a local name to create an .

returns.span: 从命名空间和本地名称构造的新 。

span.span: The new constructed from the namespace and local name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此运算符，命名空间与构造的元素或属性中的本地名称的组合的常规用法。This operator enables the common idiom of combining a namespace and a local name in the construction of an element or attribute. 此习惯用法提供了一些命名空间前缀的好处在于，你可以引用使用较短的变量的命名空间。This idiom provides some of the benefits of having namespace prefixes, in that you can refer to a namespace using a variable that is short. 这将消除中创建 XML 树的代码的语法干扰。This eliminates syntactic noise in the code that creates XML trees. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`+`运算符来创建从和本地名称。The following example shows the use of the `+` operator to create an from an and a local name. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(aw + "Child") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim aw As XNamespace = "http://www.adventure-works.com" Dim root As XElement = New XElement(aw + "Root", _ New XElement(aw + "Child") _ ) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 在 Visual Basic 中，这是首选的惯用语法：In Visual Basic, this is the preferred idiom: ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace() Dim root As XElement = _ Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` ```

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether two instances of are equal.

returns.span: 指示 和 是否相等的 。

span.span: A that indicates whether and are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运算符重载`==`和`!=`用于启用之间的比较和字符串 (例如， `element.Name.Namespace == "http://www.adventure-works.com"`)。The operator overloads `==` and `!=` are provided to enable comparisons between and string (for example, `element.Name.Namespace == "http://www.adventure-works.com"`). 在 C# 中预定义的引用相等运算符需要可以转换为类型的引用仅通过转换，另一个操作数，而不考虑隐式转换从字符串到。The predefined reference equality operators in C# require one operand to be convertible to the type of the other through reference conversions only, and do not consider the implicit conversion from string to . ## Examples 下面的示例显示的比较和字符串。The following example shows the comparison of an and a string. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; Console.WriteLine(aw == "http://www.adventure-works.com"); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace() Console.WriteLine(aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com") End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` True ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运算符重载`==`和`!=`用于启用之间的比较和字符串 (例如， `element.Name.Namespace == "http://www.adventure-works.com"`)。The operator overloads `==` and `!=` are provided to enable comparisons between and string (for example, `element.Name.Namespace == "http://www.adventure-works.com"`). 在 C# 中预定义的引用相等运算符需要可以转换为类型的引用仅通过转换，另一个操作数，而不考虑隐式转换从字符串到。The predefined reference equality operators in C# require one operand to be convertible to the type of the other through reference conversions only, and do not consider the implicit conversion from string to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示的比较为字符串。The following example shows a comparison of a to a string. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; Console.WriteLine(aw != "http://www.adventure-works.com"); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace() Console.WriteLine(aw <> "http://www.adventure-works.com") End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` False ```

span.span: Gets the object that corresponds to the XML URI (http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace).
The that corresponds to the XML URI (http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些标准化特性，如`space`，位于`http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace`命名空间。Certain standardized attributes, such as `space`, are in the `http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace` namespace. W3C 标准指定此命名空间不需要作为 XML 树中的属性声明。The W3C standard specifies that this namespace does not have to be declared as an attribute in the XML tree. 它是始终自动可用 XML 分析器中，是一个保留命名空间。It is a reserved namespace that is always automatically available in the XML parser. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建`xml:space="preserve"`XML 树中的属性：The following example shows how to create an `xml:space="preserve"` attribute in an XML tree: ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xml + "space", "preserve"), new XElement("Child", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` content ```

summary.span: 获取与 xmlns URI (http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/) 对应的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that corresponds to the xmlns URI (http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/).
The that corresponds to the **xmlns** URI (http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在声明命名空间时，这些命名空间特性本身均**xmlns**命名空间。When you declare namespaces, the namespace attributes themselves are in the **xmlns** namespace. W3C 标准指定此命名空间不需要作为 XML 树中的属性声明。The W3C standard specifies that this namespace does not have to be declared as an attribute in the XML tree. 它是始终自动可用 XML 分析器中，是一个保留命名空间。It is a reserved namespace that is always automatically available in the XML parser. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将一个命名空间添加到 XML 树。The following example shows how to add a namespace to an XML tree. 声明的命名空间的属性的命名空间是此属性返回的命名空间。The namespace for the attribute that declares the namespace is the namespace returned by this property. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Child", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root = content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 在 Visual Basic 中的首选的惯用语法是：In Visual Basic, the preferred idiom is: ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = _ content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` content ```
